I've searched around the web and many people had the same issue, and many point out that this is because amazon want it that way, the stick would work with fire phonr or fire tablets, not others.If the fire TV stick can be root to make it able to mirror my phone and laptop, I'd rate it 5 stars.!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I use the Fire TV Stick for my basement TV and have the larger Fire TV installed on my family room TV.  It appears to work identically to the larger unit, works quickly in navigating menus and costs much less.The lack of voice search on the remote was an initial let down, until I loaded the Fire TV app on my iPhone.  This free app provides voice search and works well with the Fire TV stick.  You can play games, however, the big ones (like Modern Combat 4) will take up too much memory on this unit so don't expect it to do everything the larger unit is able to do.All in all a great little streaming stick that is worth the money.
author: Keith Phillips

review: Working great for me.  Setup is quick and it runs much faster then my Sony Blu-ray player that I was using to access Amazon Prime and other internet apps. The little remote is easy to use and very intuitive.  I was thinking of getting the Google Chrome stick, but I'm glad this came out before I did. Also nice that I can upload my pictures to Amazon cloud and display them on the TV.  This up load is a bit slow, but it works fine.  Best 20 bucks I've spent.
